tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  product_description TEXT,
  specification_version INT,
  quality_control_passed BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE quality_control_parameters (
    qc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(100),
    parameter_value VARCHAR(50),
    qc_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product_specifications(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_description TEXT,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    production_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control (
    qc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    qc_date DATE,
    qc_passed BOOLEAN,
    qc_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE product_specifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    brand VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    specification TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE quality_control_parameters (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
    allowable_range VARCHAR(100),
    threshold DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE product_quality (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    parameter_id INT,
    actual_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product_specifications(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (parameter_id) REFERENCES quality_control_parameters(id)
)

CREATE TABLE product_category (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    product_description TEXT,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    quantity_in_stock INT
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control (
    qc_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    qc_parameter VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    qc_value VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    qc_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE inspections (
    inspection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    line_id INT REFERENCES production_lines(line_id),
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspection_result BOOLEAN
);
